min_size.note: Filter out small icons/avatars (secondary filter after data-media-id)

images.note: Scraper filters by data-media-id attribute (only content images), min_size is secondary filter

videos.note: Hash-based deduplication prevents downloading identical videos

audios.note: Hash-based deduplication prevents downloading identical audio files

youtube.note: mode: 'embed' (fast, no download) or 'download' (slow, requires yt-dlp)

vimeo.note: mode: 'embed' (fast, no download) or 'download' (slow, requires yt-dlp)

deduplication.note: Prevent downloading same file twice using SHA256 hash

celery.note: Celery queues for production - disabled for local development
